Html:
Hi,

i am trying to Download and save a File from Internet Explorer and my Send-keys does not work:

The First Window i get, s the download Window but i also get the Childwindow: File Download - Security Warning:

Select-code -Title "*mytitle* | Select-Childwindow | Set-WindowActive | send-keys "%s"

The Window is getting active, but the Send-Keys does not work. I can't disable the Warning so is there any way to get around this?

﻿﻿my guess is that there a special protection on this Dialog?!?
